sources.title: Bad Man of Deadwood
sources.description: Roy Rogers, George "Gabby" Hayes, and Sally Payne are members of "Professor Blackstone's Medicine Show". Their offering of tuneful entertainment and elixir receives a poor reception in the town of Deadwood, led by Bad Man Hal Taliaferro (as Ripper). They decide to stick around and extinguish the "Bad Man of Deadwood" and his wicked gang.

sources.title: Bad Man of Deadwood (1941) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Carol Adams
Director: Joseph Kane

Roy and Gabby have to establish fair business practices in the town of Deadwood, currently dominated by entrepreneurs who scare off potential competitors.

sources.title: Bad Man of Deadwood (1941) Roy Rogers & Gabby Hayes | Classic Western | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Roy and Gabby have to establish fair business practices in the town of Deadwood, currently dominated by entrepreneurs who scare off potential competitors.
 
Director: Joseph Kane
Writer: James R. Webb
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Carol Adams
Genres: Western

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Deadwood is controlled by Ripper's gang that has rendered the Sheriff and the Judge powerless. When Gabby's medicine show featuring Roy arrives they are quickly run out. They join the Laramie Gap gang that is fighting Ripper and when Gabby's inheritance money is stolen they rob the stage to get it back, Getting the money and the names assigned to it, Roy hopes this evidence will enable the Judge to bring law and order to Deadwood.
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Carol Adams
